headline: The Smartest High-Yield Oil Stock to Invest $500 in Right Now
summary: This is why the smartest oil stock for most investors right now will be reliable industry giant Chevron (NYSE: CVX).  Before getting into Chevron's business, it is worth looking at one of the biggest benefits investors get from owning the stock: its dividend.
